item.title: Q F A
item.description: QFA* # *Questions to Frequently Ask (1) What’s the purpose of this class? # The broad mandate of learning to write better is addressed by every FWS, but poetry is a particularly keen source of knowledge for writers and thinkers in any domain. The artifice and extremity of poetic language gives rise to various insights about how language works and what its capacities are more generally. Our focus on “lyric poetry” means that you will be encouraged to read poems closely and repeatedly.
Essay # There are various genres and styles of academic writing
Readings # Longer list of recommended readings not covered in class. Week 2 Monday Christian Bök, Eunoia Wednesday Christian Bök, Eunoia Friday Christian Bök, Eunoia
